title: qBittorrent LXC
textContent:
qBittorrent LXC 
                qBittorrent
                    offers a
                    user-friendly interface that allows users to search for and download torrent files easily. It also
                    supports magnet links, which allow users to start downloading files without the need for a torrent
                    file.
                
                To create a new Proxmox VE qBittorrent LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/qbittorrent.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                qBittorrent Interface: IP:8090
                ⚙️ Initial Login
                username admin
                password changeme
outerHTML:
qBittorrent LXC

qBittorrent offers a user-friendly interface that allows users to search for and download torrent files easily. It also supports magnet links, which allow users to start downloading files without the need for a torrent file.

To create a new Proxmox VE qBittorrent LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/qbittorrent.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

qBittorrent Interface: IP:8090

⚙️ Initial Login

username admin

password changeme
